# AttributeAlignment.ReplaceWithUnaligned method

Make an AttributeAlignment with the same name but marked as unaligned.

```csharp
public static AttributeAlignment ReplaceWithUnaligned(AttributeAlignment old)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| old | An old attributeAlignment to use the name from |

## Return Value

A new AttributeAlignment
